date: Sat Jun 25 2022 14:05:17 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
pageTitle: An illustration about the Smite teams announced by OTK
description: OTK has announced during its first annual gaming exposition the full roster for the Smite Invitational which includes some impressive star power in the realm of content creation spanning eight teams. The event will be casted by Smite professional players and veteran commentators.  The broadcast team will also be joined by OTK co-owner and content creator Rich Campbell. Each team will be led by a team captain and prepared by a coach who will be able to communicate with the team throughout the competitive bracket.
metaDescription: See an illustration about OTK who announced the full roster for its Smite Invitational which includes some impressive star power spanning eight teams.

topicText:
Full teams and casters announced for OTK Smite Invitational
OTK has unveiled most of the players, casters, and coaches set to participate in the organization's $100000 Smite Invitational.
